name: Mad Jet Racer
description:
Mad crazy games like mad racer is at the top among the top racer games of 2017. Unlock planes more and colorful Jet planes.

Fast based addicting touch games such as mad racer are fun and free to play. Simple touch controls, One of the top games to try. Crazy Different mode. If you are looking for fun games, give mad jet racer a try. Its fun. Its free!

Jet plane games are fun, this is top mad jet game where you will experience speed, consternation, dodge, crash. One of the top fun free space games of 2017.

This mad jet racer game have more different interesting power to save life.

We are in star war 3, when UFO spaceship attack our Earth. We step up on a jet, bring missiles like in battle Los Angeles, fly up, and join the right side to protect what belong to us.

The airway is very difficult and dangerous. You need to avoid many obstacles around. Be careful!!

Features
- Futuristic 3D Sci-Fi environment
- Endless game style
- Lots of different space vehicles to choose
- Superb elector music
- Free to play
- Interesting Different Power
